msbt.message: I've been chasing bugs with this here net just like I did when I was a kid. Sure does bring back memories The thrill of the chase The triumph of gettin' the jump on a rare critter I'll never forget the feeling! Whew! Guess I forgot how tiring bug huntin' is, though. Time to get the jump on a nap! Gahaha!
When the big toe on my left foot started tingling, I knew it was gonna be my lucky day. So, first thing I did was grab my fishin' rod. Mark my words, kiddo Today's the day I catch the big one!

So, you didn't think I was the type to enjoy watering stuff, eh? Well, I do!I like watering flowers and lots of other plants too. Carrots. Beets. Cucumbers. I'm gonna water 'em all and then make the tastiest salad ever out of 'em!

Folks collect the darndest things. Stamps. Baseball cards. Snow globes. Me, I collect umbrellas! I've got big umbrellas and little ones.I've got one in every color of the rainbow. I just love 'em!They keep rain, snow, AND the sun off me. Which makes 'em a whole lot more useful than snow globes!
